DOC.detailed_description: Parental Consent/Child Assent Child Participants : If choose take part study , ask complete total 2 3 questionnaire ( depend age ) . Each questionnaire complete . If 6-7 year old , give 2 questionnaire ask physical health illness , personal strength . These questionnaire take 30-45 minute finish . If 8-18 year old , give 3 questionnaire ask physical health illness , personal strength , emotional adjustment disease . These 3 questionnaire take 30-45 minute total finish . A research assistant help questionnaire , need help . If give questionnaire hospital complete leave , give stamp envelope mail form back study staff . After questionnaire finish , member research team might look medical chart need information treatment status disease . Parent Participants : If choose take part study , ask complete total 5 questionnaire . These questionnaire ask information child 's emotional adjustment disease , child 's physical health illness , child 's personal strength , emotional distress , overall function family . Each questionnaire complete . It take 45-60 minute complete 5 questionnaire . Medical Staff Participants : If choose take part study , ask complete questionnaire ask information patient 's illness . It take 3-5 minute complete one-time survey . All Groups : This investigational study . About 220 people ( 100 child , 100 parent , 20 medical staff ) take part multicenter study . About 130 enrol M. D. Anderson ( 60 child , 60 parent , 10 medical staff member ) .
